common.coreFeaturesDesc: 让您的项目更轻松的核心特性

slogan.description: AI生成可视化原型设计和编辑平台，支持2D，3D模型，结合LLM(Large Language Model) 快速编辑。

feature.title: 源码可控
feature.details: 高质量的代码，后端代码通过阿里代码规范检查，前端代码全部经过 ESlint 语法的严格检验，保证可读性和健壮性

feature.title: 简单易用
feature.details: StreamPark 的初衷是为了让流处理更简单，提供了一系列快捷 API 和 Connector，开箱即用，简化开发

feature.title: 文档详尽
feature.details: 从概念到上手再到进阶高级，每个使用细节和注意事项都详细罗列，并辅助大量代码示例，让开发者一目了然

feature.title: 健壮稳定
feature.details: 大数据领域资深玩家打造，每个API、每处设计都经过精心打磨。测试用例齐全，经历线上项目验证，保证稳定可靠

feature.title: 流批一体
feature.details: StreamPark 以 Flink & Spark 为底层框架，让流批一体落地更加简单，连接互通，跨越框架间的屏障，创造更多可能性

feature.title: 一站式解决方案
feature.details: StreamPark 集成了项目编译、发布、参数配置、任务监控、在线 IDE 等众多功能于一身，是一个一站式综合数据平台

honor.description: 我们获得了些殊荣，这些荣誉属于所有为 SolidUI 做出贡献的人，感谢您的付出！

common.coreFeaturesDesc: Modern features that will make your project easier.

slogan.description: AI-generated visualization prototyping and editing platform, support 2D, 3D models, combined with LLM(Large Language Model) for quick editing.

feature.title: Code controllable
feature.details: High-quality code. Fro readability and robustness backend code uses Ali code check style and frontend code is strictly checked with eslint

feature.title: Complete docs
feature.details: From concept to quickstart and advanced, each step is explained in detail with code samples.

feature.title: Robust and stable
feature.details: Created by big data experts. Well-designed API. Complete test cases. Verified by production project.

feature.title: Batch & Streaming
feature.details: StreamPark base on Apache Flink and Apache Spark and implements a layer of abstraction, make stream and batch processing in a single engine.

feature.title: One-stop solution
feature.details: StreamPark integrates project compile, release, parameter configuration, task monitoring, online IDE and many other features.

honor.description: We have received some precious honors, which belong to everyone who contributes to SolidUI, Thanks
